description: Aragorn II Elessar, also known as Aragorn, is the rightful heir to the throne of Gondor.  He is a tall, strong ranger with a stoic demeanor, known for his courage, honor, and loyalty.  He is a skilled warrior and wise leader, deeply committed to his people and the fate of Middle-earth. Aragorn displays patience and camaraderie with his companions, particularly the Hobbits, while maintaining a measured and commanding presence in times of conflict.
